Applicant : Miranda, Jacy
School (district) : Henry's Fork Elementary (Fremont County School District #215)
Role(s) : Upper Elementary Teacher (3rd+);
LinkedIn Profile : I own my own business and connect people together, schedule appointments, schedule travel, teach injections, etc.

INTERESTS
Why they want to be a part of this program:
	* I am honestly open to learning anything that will benefit the students. I feel that educating myself and learning new things and new strategies can benefit the kids in such a positive way and that is what I am here for!
